```{r}

pairs <- function(Test_Frame){
vector1 <- character() #creates an empty charater vector
vector2 <- numeric()
string <- character()
pcc <- numeric()

for (i in  1:(length(Test_Frame)-1)) {
  for (j in (i+1):length(Test_Frame)) {
    string <- paste(colnames(Test_Frame[i]),colnames(Test_Frame[j]),sep="-")
    vector1 <- c(vector1,string)
    pcc <- cor(Test_Frame[i],Test_Frame[j],method = "pearson")
    vector2 <- c(vector2,pcc)
  }
  }
outputdataframe <- data.frame(vector1,vector2)
return(outputdataframe)
}

pairs(diamonds[,nums])

colnames(diamonds[,nums])
head(diamonds)
str(head(diamonds))
cor(diamonds[,nums][1],diamonds[,nums][3])
```
